title: OCE Stream 2x$10 giveaways (4pm/6pm QLD time), plat 2 mid laner, playing norms and rank :D

embed.description: OCE]-HD- Plat 1 Mid Laner, Games with Viewers :D

body:
STREAM IS LIVE, VIEWER GAMES and RP GIVEAWAYS!!!!

Heyya guys, we are live now playing viewer games, and at around 4pm and 6pm QLD time we will be doing a $10 rp giveaways.

Come play some normals with us then watch me feed in rank o.0?

See you guys there!!!
Duckyy {{champion:34}}

replies.body: What's with twitch channels and buying viewer/follower or w/e with RP cards.

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cMqa3s6b,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-02-09T06:32:15.144+0000)
>
> What's with twitch channels and buying viewer/follower or w/e with RP cards.

go away if your gonna be salty

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cMqa3s6b,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-02-09T06:35:07.096+0000)
>
> go away if your gonna be salty

I'm not exactly being salty am I? I can go get my own RP whenever I want I am just curious as to why like literally every twitch stream post on GD makes a big deal about RP giveaways. IMO making people watch/follow your channel for giveaways devalues your channel cuz you get people who are just there for the prizes or w/e.
There are many reasons as to why, if you look into how to grow a stream youll soon understand why we do it. its not BUYING our viewers either :)
He isn't really buying anything...It's not like he pays people to do things for him, If you wanna check out a pretty cool stream do it, it's just an added bonus to have an RP card up for grabs..
Yo! MysticNZ here im hanging out over on duckys stream tonight! Come win some RP! :D
is it random, how do we enter?

Top lad right here. {{champion:34}}  Chuck him a follow.
Twitch username: Turono
mrtreeputt im just here for the tokens XD
make sure to follow Duckyy!!!! XD my twitch name is happybannanajr

YO Duckky
Its the same old name
